title: Side Effects of Running for Congress in Tennessee (with Odessa Kelly)
description:
This week we talk to Odessa Kelly, candidate for Tennessee's 7th congressional district, about being a justice democrat, changing harmful traditions in her home state, and why her opponent, Mark Green, is trash.
@OdessaKellyTN on Twitter and IG
~
Get tickets to The Black Outside Again Tour! amandaseales.com/tourdates
~
